name: CASE_CONT_QUEST
description: The CASE_CONT_QUEST table allows you to report on questionnaires for each contact in the Chronic Disease Case Management module.

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID for the case record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The contact date in decimal format.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count of questionnaire information for the case record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The contact date in datetime format.

columns.name: QUEST_FORM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire form.

columns.name: QUEST_FORM_ID_FORM_NAME
columns.description: The name of the form associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_ANSWER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the questionnaire answer.

columns.name: QUEST_TIME
columns.description: The date and time of the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user associated with the questionnaire.

columns.name: QUEST_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
